snippet.title: STARMINER - Navigation Gameplay Trailer | Paradox Arc
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1116050/Starminer/  

In Starminer you design and build an interstellar mining fleet to strip space of its invaluable minerals, and sell them for a tidy profit. But beware. Your greed may attract unwanted attention. Use warships and defense platforms to protect your fleet at all costs and push back the frontier of space.

In this trailer we introduce you to the concept of navigation in Starminer. Six degrees of freedom, realistic Newtonian physics and challenges that come with them. To sell what you mine, first you need to survive shipping it to your buyers!

Subscribe to Starminer channel: / https://www.youtube.com/@StarminerGame   
Follow our TikTok: / https://www.tiktok.com/@starminergame  
Or follow us on X:   / https://twitter.com/StarminerGame  
Join us on Discord: / https://discord.gg/WzYymcD  

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
